headline: Stephens & Co. Maintains Equal-Weight on APA, Raises Price Target to $24
summary: Stephens & Co.  analyst Mike Scialla   maintains APA (NASDAQ:APA) with a Equal-Weight and raises the price target from $23 to $24.
